text: 25B-NBOH (2C-B-NBOH, NBOH-2C-B) is a derivative of the phenethylamine derived hallucinogen 2C-B which has been sold as a designer drug. It acts as a potent serotonin receptor agonist with similar affinity to the better-known compound 25B-NBOMe at 5-HT2A and 5-HT2C receptors with pKis values of 8.3 and 9.4, respectively. == Legal status == ===Sweden=== The Riksdag added 25B-NBOH to Narcotic Drugs Punishments Act under swedish schedule I ("substances, plant materials and fungi which normally do not have medical use") as of January 26, 2016, published by Medical Products Agency (MPA) in regulation HSLF-FS 2015:35 listed as 25B-NBOH, and 2-([2-(4-bromo-2,5-dimetoxifenyl)etylamino]metyl)fenol. ===United Kingdom=== ===Analogues and derivatives=== == References == Category:25-NB (psychedelics) Category:Designer drugs Category:Bromoarenes
title: 25B-NBOH
